common.how to add money description: Tap on 'Wallet' in More options or Home Screen, Choose Amount, Select Payment Method, Complete Payment.After that come back to the app and refresh the page.

common.web version intro: Use Dudhiya on your laptop/computer for faster work and advanced tools. Everything in the app is available on web, plus:
common.web feature bulk entries: Bulk collection entries (add many entries at once)
common.web feature bulk editing: Bulk editing of milk rate (update many rates together)
common.partner intro: Partner with us to run a local office. Manage multiple dairies or collection centers, enter collections, and generate reports for them. Earn by providing these services.
common.fat step description: Rate applies when Fat% is greater than step
common.snf step description: Rate applies when SNF% is less than step
